description:
TL;DR: FolderFort Pro offers 1TB of lifetime cloud storage for $59.97 (reg. $251), letting you securely store and access your files without subscriptions.

Your digital life deserves some breathing room, and 1TB of cloud storage is the solution you didn’t know you needed. With FolderFort Pro, you can
title: The Black Friday cloud storage deal that’s actually worth it — only $60 for life

description:
Wellllllllll those rumors of an impending launch for Intel’s next-gen Arc “Battlemage” graphics cards in December are looking a lot more concrete now. We discussed the whispers on this week’s episode of our Full Nerd podcast, but now, a listing for an Intel B580 desktop graphics card just popped up on Amazon on Friday night.

Awkward.

Videocardz spotted the listing for the ASRock Intel ARC B580 Steel Legend 12GB OC before anyone else. Beyond the confirmation of the product existing, perhaps the most interesting part of this oopsie-daisy leak is right in the name: The Arc B580 packs 12GB of GDDR6 mem
title: Oops! Intel’s unannounced Arc B580 graphics card leaks on Amazon
